content.question: The choice of the site for the Colosseum in Rome indicates that members of the Flavian Dynasty sought to

choices.label: affirm their ties to great rulers such as Julius Caesar by building the structure on the site where Caesar was assassinated
eradicate the memory of Nero by building the structure on an area that had previously belonged to him
promote their political legitimacy by constructing the building as part of the imperial forum
draw attention to their military power by constructing the building with the spoils from their victory over the Parthians

content.answer: eradicate the memory of Nero by building the structure on an area that had previously belonged to him
